Segment.name: R3
Segment.comment: To specify carrier and routing sequences and details

Field.name: RoutingSequenceCode
Field.comment: Code describing the relationship of a carrier to a specific shipment movement

Field.name: TransportationMethodTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the method or type of transportation for the shipment

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode3
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier
